text: Zisas mba kamen mbe nzua vov wom khaŋ mbe nzuai, “Nde rɨgar guma the maaŋ muuŋgip ŋaara guma the kɨrga. Ana ŋaara guma ŋgɨp ana mɨna khorga o, ŋgɨp ana sipsivi ganɨnga. Ana mba ŋaarar muuŋgip, taagi ŋkotugun phenan zɨrga. Ana maaŋ muuŋgip taagi phen zɨrim, ana gari guma bakɨme, khaŋ ana suaŋrie, ‘Ndu vhemkora zɨv khaŋ perav mban mbɨ?’
